 Expected code:
# Preset variables:
library(dplyr)
cDF <- data.frame(
  A=c(1,2,3,4),
  B=c('a','b','c','d'),
  C=c(TRUE,FALSE,TRUE,TRUE)
  )

# The code:
number_of_rows <- nrow(cDF)
number_of_cols <- ncol(cDF)
col_names <- colnames(cDF)
col2 <- cDF[,2]
df1 <- cDF[1,]
df2 <- dplyr::select(cDF,A,C)
df3 <- cDF %>% dplyr::select(A,C)
df4 <- cDF %>%
  filter(C==TRUE) %>%
  select(A,C)
df5_f <- function(f) {
cDF %>%
  filter(C==f) %>%
  select(A,C)
}
